   \begin{subfigure}[b]{0.49\textwidth}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}[cramped, column sep=scriptsize]
	{} \\
	\circ && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	\bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	\bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	\bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet
	\arrow[shorten <=6pt, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=2-5, to=2-7]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-7, to=4-7]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", from=4-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["a"', from=4-1, to=6-1]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-1, to=6-3]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", from=4-3, to=4-5]
	\arrow["a"', from=4-3, to=6-3]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-3, to=6-5]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=4-5, to=4-7]
	\arrow["a"', from=4-5, to=6-5]
	\arrow["{a_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-5, to=6-7]
	\arrow["a"{description}, from=4-7, to=6-7]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", from=6-1, to=6-3]
	\arrow["b"', from=6-1, to=8-1]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-1, to=8-3]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", from=6-3, to=6-5]
	\arrow["b"', from=6-3, to=8-3]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-3, to=8-5]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=6-5, to=6-7]
	\arrow["b"', from=6-5, to=8-5]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-5, to=8-7]
	\arrow["b", from=6-7, to=8-7]
	\arrow["{\texttt{first}}"{description}, from=8-1, to=8-3]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=8-3, to=8-5]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=8-5, to=8-7]
\end{tikzcd}\]
      \caption{Left merge with $\tau$ communications}
   \end{subfigure}
   \hfill
   \begin{subfigure}[b]{0.49\textwidth}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}[cramped, column sep=scriptsize]
	{} \\
	\circ && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	\bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	\bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	\bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet
	\arrow[shorten <=6pt, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=2-5, to=2-7]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-7, to=4-7]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["a"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-1, to=6-1]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-1, to=6-3]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-3, to=4-5]
	\arrow["a"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-3, to=6-3]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-3, to=6-5]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-5, to=4-7]
	\arrow["a"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-5, to=6-5]
	\arrow["{a_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-5, to=6-7]
	\arrow["a"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-7, to=6-7]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-1, to=6-3]
	\arrow["b"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-1, to=8-1]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-1, to=8-3]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-3, to=6-5]
	\arrow["b"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-3, to=8-3]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-3, to=8-5]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-5, to=6-7]
	\arrow["b"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-5, to=8-5]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-5, to=8-7]
	\arrow["b", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-7, to=8-7]
	\arrow["{\texttt{first}}"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=8-1, to=8-3]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=8-3, to=8-5]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=8-5, to=8-7]
\end{tikzcd}\]
      \caption{Restriction of $H_{1}$ with $\tau$ actions}
   \end{subfigure}
   \caption{Example of Triggering operator with internal actions}
   \label{fig:triggering-tau}
